han.definition: Refers to the subjects existance and relation to the object.

hotá.definition: Refers to the subjects non-existance and irrelation to the object.

symi.definition: Males attaining the age of adulthood. When applied to children, it may signify their maturity.

cévo.definition: Males attaining the age of adulthood. When applied to children, it may signify their maturity.

náu.definition: Appearing tall or big in reference to the speaker

mikol.definition: Appearing short or small in reference to the speaker

su.definition: used to connect words of the same part of speech, clauses, or sentences, that are to be taken jointly.
